data.prompt: Write a brief, polite email to inform a customer that their order will be delayed by 2 days.
data.response:
Subject: Update on Your Recent Order

Dear [Customer Name],

Thank you for your recent order!

We're writing to let you know that your order will be slightly delayed by approximately two days. We are working hard to get it to you as quickly as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. We will send you another email with tracking information as soon as your order ships.

Thanks for your understanding.

Sincerely,

The [Your Company Name] Team
